clinical_study.brief_title: Cortisol Diurnal Variation and the Risk for Developing Post Traumatic Stress Disorder

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to examine a possible link between the time of day of exposure to a traumatic event and the risk of developing post-traumatic stress disorder. Clinical and biological correlates will also be examined from this perspective.

secondary_outcome.measure: Biological correlates of post-traumatic stress disorder
correlation between development of Posttraumatice stress disorder and time of traumatic event
